name: PARTY_IDENTITY
title: PARTY_IDENTITY
description: An identity owned by a Party, such as a person name or company name, and which is used by the Party to identify itself. Actual structure is archetyped.

element.short: An identity owned by a Party, such as a person name or company name, and which is used by the Party to identify itself
element.definition: An identity owned by a Party, such as a person name or company name, and which is used by the Party to identify itself. Actual structure is archetyped.

element.short: The value of the identity. This will often taken the form of a parseable string or a small structure of strings
element.definition: The value of the identity. This will often taken the form of a parseable string or a small structure of strings.
